mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todo(title, content, deadline, complete, priority) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{deadline}, #{complete}, #{priority})
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, deadline, complete, priority FROM todo ORDER BY deadline ASC
SELECT id, title, content, deadline, complete, priority FROM todo ORDER BY priority DESC
SELECT id, title, content, deadline, complete, priority FROM todo WHERE id = #{id}
